InstructionData.Title: PCS-AV2-HP - Pressure Control System 2xAV + Hazard
InstructionData.Author: Unknown
InstructionData.Instructions:
# PCS-AV2-HP - Pressure Control System / 2 Active Vents / Hazard Protection # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias GasSensor d0 alias VentIn d1 alias VentOut d2 alias Hazard d3
define SETPOINT 101.325 define DIFF 1 define OVERSHOOT 0.5 define TOXIC 0.5 #kpa
alias lowtarget r1 alias hightarget r2 alias ventinsetting r3 alias ventoutsetting r4 alias ventinsp r5 alias ventoutsp r6 alias ventinact r7 alias ventoutact r8 alias pressure r9 alias presok r11 # pressure OK alias hazard r10 alias temp1 r13 alias temp2 r14
init: sub ventinact SETPOINT DIFF move ventinsp SETPOINT add ventoutact SETPOINT DIFF move ventoutsp SETPOINT
s VentIn Lock 0 s VentIn Mode 1 s VentIn On 1 s VentOut Lock 0 s VentOut Mode 1 s VentOut On 1
move ventinsetting ventinact move ventoutsetting ventoutact
loop: l pressure GasSensor Pressure
jal checkhazardx
beqz hazard safe s Hazard On 1 safe: sge presok pressure ventinsetting select ventinsetting presok ventinact ventinsp #add ventinsetting ventinsetting OVERSHOOT
sle presok pressure ventoutsetting select ventoutsetting presok ventoutact ventoutsp #sub ventoutsetting ventoutsetting OVERSHOOT #sle presok pressure ventoutsetting setvent: s VentIn PressureExternal 0 s VentIn PressureInternal ventinsetting
s VentOut PressureExternal ventoutsetting s VentOut PressureInternal 40000
move temp1 ventinsetting round temp1 temp1 mul temp1 temp1 100000 add temp1 temp1 ventoutsetting round temp1 temp1 s db Setting temp1 yield j loop
checkhazardx: l temp1 GasSensor RatioVolatiles l temp2 GasSensor RatioPollutant add temp1 temp1 temp2 # volatiles + pollutant mul temp1 temp1 pressure # toxins * pressure sge hazard temp1 TOXIC j ra
#hazard: #mul ventinsetting hightarget 1.025 #mul ventoutsetting lowtarget 0.975
#j setvent
